intro: Fuirena glabra, commonly known as the smooth fuirena, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is native to southern Europe and western Asia, often found in dry, rocky soils. The plant has slender, branching stems and small, white or greenish-yellow flowers arranged in umbels. Its leaves are lance-shaped and often covered in fine hairs. Fuirena glabra is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
